resources.string:
Develop Flow that sums values of other flows. 
" "1. UI - must consist of 3 items. Enter field, ‘launch’ Button and Text field for output. On press ‘launch’ app handle N - digit has been entered in the Enter field. Result of the work should be rendered to the Text field. Every new update should be on the new line. 
" "2. It is necessary to create an array of Flow of Int of N. Each after a delay of (index + 1) * 100, emits the value index + 1. I.e. Flow with index 0 emits value 1 with delay 100, Flow with index 1 emits value 2 with delay 200. 
" "3. The resulting Flow must sum the values of all N Flows. The summing Flow must return a value after updating each of the N Flows. 
Important: The value on the screen must be added every 100ms. 
 
Example: 
N entered: 1 
Result: 1 
 
N entered: 2 
Result: 1
3 
 
N entered: 3 
Result: 1
3
6 
 
N entered: 7 
Result: 1
3
6
10
15
21
28
